titles.title: Happy Is That People That Is In Such A Case

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Happy is that people that is in such a case.
Happy is that people that is in such a case.
Happy is that people that is in such a case.
Whose God is the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That our sons may be as plants grown up,
That our daughters may be as cornerstones
That our garners may be full.
That our oxen may be strong,
That there be no complaining in our streets.
Hallelujah!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bienaventurado este pueblo es.
Bienaventurado este pueblo es.
Bienaventurado este pueblo es,
Cuyo Dios es Jehová.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Que sus hijos serán como plantas crecidas,
Que sus hijas serán como esquinas labradas.
Sus graneros serán llenos,
Y sus bueyes serán fuertes
Y en sus calles quejas no habrá.
